div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Hepatitis B vaccine as soon as possible after birth

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Hepatitis B - No Doses and Premature birth or low birth weight
description: Provide Hepatitis B immunizations – using the "Hepatitis B vaccine immunization – Birth dose" schedule (Birth dose)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because no doses and (low birth weight or premature infant)
Should vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because no doses and (low birth weight or premature infant)
Should vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because no doses and (low birth weight or premature infant)

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Hepatitis B - No Doses
description: Provide Hepatitis B immunizations – using the "Hepatitis B vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 doses scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because no doses

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Hepatitis B - 1 Dose
description: Provide Hepatitis B immunizations – using the "Hepatitis B vaccine immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 doses scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because 1 dose
"Date last Hepatitis B dose given" >= "4 weeks"
Should vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because 1 dose

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Hepatitis B - 2 Doses
description: Provide Hepatitis B immunizations – using the "Hepatitis B vaccine immunization – 2 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 doses scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because 2 doses
"Date last Hepatitis B dose given" >= "4 weeks"
Should vaccinate patient for Hepatitis B because 2 doses
